channel.title: Hot zone icons? [508/525]
channel.description: hey guys i need help, i have it so that when your not in a hot zone, it shows the skull with the cross, but when i go into a hot zone, it turns into the hotzone icon, but doesnt change back when your in a safezone. please help, ill rep++
